title: Black
description: Black coffee is as simple as it gets with ground coffee beans steeped in hot water, served warm. And if you want to sound fancy, you can call black coffee by its proper name: cafe noir.

title: Latte
description: As the most popular coffee drink out there, the latte is comprised of a shot of espresso and steamed milk with just a touch of foam. It can be ordered plain or with a flavor shot of anything from vanilla to pumpkin spice.

title: Americano
description: With a similar flavor to black coffee, the americano consists of an espresso shot diluted in hot water.

title: Espresso
description: An espresso shot can be served solo or used as the foundation of most coffee drinks, like lattes and macchiatos.

title: Doppio
description: A double shot of espresso, the doppio is perfect for putting extra pep in your step.

title: Cortado
description: Like yin and yang, a cortado is the perfect balance of espresso and warm steamed milk. The milk is used to cut back on the espresso’s acidity.

title: Red Eye
description: Named after those pesky midnight flights, a red eye can cure any tiresome morning. A full cup of hot coffee with an espresso shot mixed in, this will definitely get your heart racing.

title: Galão
description: Originating in Portugal, this hot coffee drink is closely related to the latte and cappuccino. Only difference is it contains about twice as much foamed milk, making it a lighter drink compared to the other two.

title: Lungo
description: A lungo is a long-pull espresso. The longer the pull, the more caffeine there is and the more ounces you can enjoy.

title: Macchiato
description: The macchiato is another espresso-based drink that has a small amount of foam on top. It’s the happy medium between a cappuccino and a doppio.

title: Mocha
description: For all you chocolate lovers out there, you’ll fall in love with a mocha (or maybe you already have). The mocha is a chocolate espresso drink with steamed milk and foam.

title: Ristretto
description: Ristretto is an espresso shot. It uses less hot water which creates a sweeter flavor compared to the bitter taste of a traditional shot of espresso or a doppio.

title: Flat White
description: This Aussie-born drink is basically a cappuccino without the foam or chocolate sprinkle. It’s an espresso drink with steamed milk.

title: Affogato
description: The affogato is an excuse to enjoy a scoop of ice cream any time of day (and any time of year in my opinion). Served with a scoop of ice cream and a shot of espresso, or two.

title: Café au Lait
description: Café au lait is perfect for the coffee minimalist who wants a bit more flavor. Just add a splash of warm milk to your coffee and you’re all set!

title: Irish
description: Irish coffee consists of black coffee, whiskey and sugar, topped with whipped cream.

title: Guayoyo
description: Traditional venezuelan coffee prepared by filtering the ground coffee in a cone of cloth and pouring hot water on top of it. It's prefferably drinked wihout milk nor cream.

title: Cortadito
description: Traditional cuban coffee method where a bit of freshly brewed coffee is mixed with sugar to create a highly sugared paste. Then add the rest of the coffee and stir adding milk until a 50/50 ratio is achieved.

title: Aguapanela Coffee
description: Bring panela and coffee to a boil in a small pan for 30 minutes until panela is melted. Brew your coffee using your favorite brewing technique but add the hot aguapanela instead of hot water. Delicious sweetened coffee is ready.

title: Cappuccino
description: Cappuccino is a latte made with more foam than steamed milk, often with a sprinkle of cocoa powder or cinnamon on top. Sometimes you can find variations that use cream instead of milk or ones that throw in flavor shot, as well.

title: CUPOJOE
description: Cappuccino is a latte made with more foam than steamed milk, often with a sprinkle of cocoa powder or cinnamon on top. Sometimes you can find variations that use cream instead of milk or ones that throw in flavor shot, as well.

title: Pike Place Roast
description: A smooth, well-rounded blend with subtle notes of cocoa and toasted nuts.

title: Caffe Americano
description: Espresso shots topped with hot water, creating a drink similar to traditional drip coffee but with a distinct flavor profile.

title: Cappuccino
description: Equal parts of espresso, steamed milk, and milk foam, resulting in a velvety, frothy coffee experience.

title: Caffe Misto
description: A one-to-one ratio of freshly brewed coffee and steamed milk, topped with a thin layer of foam.

title: Flat White
description: Rich, full-bodied espresso with steamed milk and a small, dense foam on top.

title: Caffe Latte
description: Espresso with steamed milk, creating a creamy and milder coffee experience.

title: Mocha
description: Espresso with steamed milk, infused with chocolate syrup and topped with whipped cream.

title: White Chocolate Mocha
description: Espresso with steamed milk and white chocolate sauce, topped with whipped cream.

title: Caramel Macchiato
description: Espresso with steamed milk and vanilla-flavored syrup, topped with caramel drizzle.

title: Flat White
description: Rich, full-bodied espresso with steamed milk and a small, dense foam on top.

title: Cinnamon Dolce Latte
description: Espresso with steamed milk and cinnamon dolce syrup, topped with whipped cream and cinnamon sugar.

title: Espresso
description: A strong and concentrated coffee made by forcing hot water through finely-ground coffee beans.

title: Espresso Macchiato
description: Espresso with a small amount of steamed milk, resulting in a strong coffee flavor with a touch of creaminess.

title: Black Brewed Coffee
description: Freshly brewed coffee made from carefully selected coffee beans, served hot.

title: Iced Caramel Macchiato
description: Espresso with cold milk and vanilla-flavored syrup, topped with caramel drizzle.

title: Vanilla Latte
description: Espresso with steamed milk and vanilla-flavored syrup, topped with a creamy foam.

title: Toffee Nut Latte
description: Espresso with steamed milk and toffee nut syrup, finished with whipped cream and toffee nut sprinkles.

title: Peppermint Mocha
description: Espresso with steamed milk, peppermint-flavored syrup, and chocolate syrup, topped with whipped cream and chocolate curls.

title: Chestnut Praline Latte
description: Espresso with steamed milk and chestnut praline syrup, topped with whipped cream and spiced praline crumbs.

title: Caramel Brulée Latte
description: Espresso with steamed milk and caramel brulée sauce, topped with whipped cream and caramel brulée topping.

title: Blonde Caffè Americano
description: Espresso shots topped with hot water, creating a drink similar to traditional drip coffee but with a distinct flavor profile.

title: Irish Cream Cold Brew
description: Cold brew coffee with Irish cream syrup, topped with vanilla sweet cream cold foam and a dash of cocoa powder.

title: Maple Pecan Latte
description: Espresso with steamed milk and maple pecan syrup, finished with a sprinkle of maple pecan topping.

title: Honey Almondmilk Flat White
description: Bold ristretto shots of espresso with steamed almond milk and a touch of honey, creating a creamy and nutty coffee.

title: Coconutmilk Latte
description: Espresso with steamed coconut milk, resulting in a smooth and creamy coffee with a hint of coconut flavor.

title: Vanilla Sweet Cream Cold Brew
description: Cold brew coffee with vanilla syrup, topped with a float of house-made vanilla sweet cream.

title: Salted Caramel Mocha
description: Espresso with steamed milk, mocha sauce, and toffee nut syrup, topped with whipped cream, caramel drizzle, and sea salt sugar topping.

title: Toasted White Chocolate Mocha
description: Espresso with steamed milk and toasted white chocolate mocha sauce, topped with whipped cream and candied cranberry sugar.

title: Chestnut Praline Frappuccino
description: A creamy blend of chestnut praline syrup and milk, topped with whipped cream and spiced praline crumbs.

title: Holiday Spice Flat White
description: Bold ristretto shots of espresso with steamed milk and a hint of holiday spice, finished with a sprinkle of holiday spice topping.

title: Pepper Nitro with a Jerky Twist
description: Nitro cold brew coffee infused with a sweet malted fennel black pepper syrup, finished with a piece of beef jerky.

title: Honey Almond Cold Brew
description: Cold brew coffee with almond milk and a touch of honey, garnished with a honey almond topping.

title: Smoked Butterscotch Latte
description: Espresso with steamed milk and smoked butterscotch sauce, topped with whipped cream and smoked butterscotch sugar.

title: Bakery-Style Brewed Coffee
description: Freshly brewed coffee made in a bakery-style, perfect for coffee purists.

title: Café au Lait
description: Coffee with steamed milk, resulting in a milder coffee experience.

title: Decaf Pike Place Roast
description: A smooth, well-rounded blend with subtle notes of cocoa and toasted nuts, without the caffeine.

title: Flat White
description: Rich, full-bodied espresso with steamed milk and a small, dense foam on top.

title: Irish Coffee
description: Hot coffee with a shot of Irish whiskey, sugar, and topped with whipped cream.

title: Cinnamon Dolce Latte
description: Espresso with steamed milk and cinnamon dolce syrup, topped with whipped cream and cinnamon sugar.

title: Café Mocha
description: Espresso with steamed milk and mocha sauce, topped with whipped cream.

title: Hot Chocolate
description: Rich, creamy chocolatey goodness topped with whipped cream.

title: Café Caramel Macchiato
description: Espresso with steamed milk, vanilla syrup, and caramel drizzle.

title: Peppermint Hot Chocolate
description: Rich hot chocolate infused with peppermint syrup, topped with whipped cream and peppermint sprinkles.

title: Coconut Mocha
description: Espresso with steamed coconut milk and chocolate syrup, topped with whipped cream and toasted coconut flakes.

title: Hot Vanilla
description: Steamed milk with vanilla syrup, simple and delightful.
